alfredsnippet.snippet:
I want to put the physical back into physics. We will certainly explain far less of the perceived Universe if we do as I suggest, but we will explain it in a fundamentally better way. I would like science to deal with reality as first priority, and leave the philosophical arguments for those moments of introspection that set in when it's raining and we can't look at the stars."

- Hilton Ratcliffe, Declaration of Intent: Swimming with the salmon, dining with the bears, December 2008
alfredsnippet.name: Phys.org Post - Put the Physical Back Into Physics
